column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/0713ae7970339d7d9df3f9870cb3407002b5b8ac for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Translation errors must be fixed using Transifex, the source of all our translations:  https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/bitcoin/\n
I do agree with the change, though :)\n
